account.description:
Account information at a given round.

Definition:
data/basics/userBalance.go : AccountData

amount.description: total number of MicroAlgos in the account

amount-without-pending-rewards.description: specifies the amount of MicroAlgos in the account, without the pending rewards.

apps-local-state.description:
application local data stored in this account.

Note the raw object uses `map[int] -> AppLocalState` for this type.

items.description: Stores local state associated with an application.

closed-out-at-round.description: Round when account closed out of the application.

deleted.description: Whether or not the application local state is currently deleted from its account.

id.description: The application which this local state is for.

key-value.description: Represents a key-value store for use in an application.

items.description: Represents a key-value pair in an application store.

type.description: type of the value. Value `1` refers to **bytes**, value `2` refers to **uint**

opted-in-at-round.description: Round when the account opted into the application.

schema.description: Specifies maximums on the number of each type that may be stored.

apps-total-extra-pages.description: the sum of all extra application program pages for this account.

apps-total-schema.description: Specifies maximums on the number of each type that may be stored.

assets.description:
assets held by this account.

Note the raw object uses `map[int] -> AssetHolding` for this type.

items.description:
Describes an asset held by an account.

Definition:
data/basics/userBalance.go : AssetHolding

deleted.description: Whether or not the asset holding is currently deleted from its account.

is-frozen.description: whether or not the holding is frozen.

opted-in-at-round.description: Round during which the account opted into this asset holding.

opted-out-at-round.description: Round during which the account opted out of this asset holding.

auth-addr.description: The address against which signing should be checked. If empty, the address of the current account is used. This field can be updated in any transaction by setting the RekeyTo field.

closed-at-round.description: Round during which this account was most recently closed.

created-apps.description:
parameters of applications created by this account including app global data.

Note: the raw account uses `map[int] -> AppParams` for this type.

created-at-round.description: Round when this application was created.

deleted.description: Whether or not this application is currently deleted.

deleted-at-round.description: Round when this application was deleted.

params.description: Stores the global information associated with an application.

creator.description: The address that created this application. This is the address where the parameters and global state for this application can be found.

extra-program-pages.description: the number of extra program pages available to this app.

global-state.description: Represents a key-value store for use in an application.

items.description: Represents a key-value pair in an application store.

type.description: type of the value. Value `1` refers to **bytes**, value `2` refers to **uint**

global-state-schema.description: Specifies maximums on the number of each type that may be stored.

local-state-schema.description: Specifies maximums on the number of each type that may be stored.

version.description: the number of updates to the application programs

created-assets.description:
parameters of assets created by this account.

Note: the raw account uses `map[int] -> Asset` for this type.

items.description: Specifies both the unique identifier and the parameters for an asset

created-at-round.description: Round during which this asset was created.

deleted.description: Whether or not this asset is currently deleted.

destroyed-at-round.description: Round during which this asset was destroyed.

params.description:
AssetParams specifies the parameters for an asset.

\[apar\] when part of an AssetConfig transaction.

Definition:
data/transactions/asset.go : AssetParams

clawback.description: Address of account used to clawback holdings of this asset.  If empty, clawback is not permitted.

creator.description: The address that created this asset. This is the address where the parameters for this asset can be found, and also the address where unwanted asset units can be sent in the worst case.

decimals.description: The number of digits to use after the decimal point when displaying this asset. If 0, the asset is not divisible. If 1, the base unit of the asset is in tenths. If 2, the base unit of the asset is in hundredths, and so on. This value must be between 0 and 19 (inclusive).

default-frozen.description: Whether holdings of this asset are frozen by default.

freeze.description: Address of account used to freeze holdings of this asset.  If empty, freezing is not permitted.

manager.description: Address of account used to manage the keys of this asset and to destroy it.

metadata-hash.description: A commitment to some unspecified asset metadata. The format of this metadata is up to the application.

name.description: Name of this asset, as supplied by the creator. Included only when the asset name is composed of printable utf-8 characters.

name-b64.description: Base64 encoded name of this asset, as supplied by the creator.

reserve.description: Address of account holding reserve (non-minted) units of this asset.

total.description: The total number of units of this asset.

unit-name.description: Name of a unit of this asset, as supplied by the creator. Included only when the name of a unit of this asset is composed of printable utf-8 characters.

unit-name-b64.description: Base64 encoded name of a unit of this asset, as supplied by the creator.

url.description: URL where more information about the asset can be retrieved. Included only when the URL is composed of printable utf-8 characters.

url-b64.description: Base64 encoded URL where more information about the asset can be retrieved.

created-at-round.description: Round during which this account first appeared in a transaction.

deleted.description: Whether or not this account is currently closed.

incentive-eligible.description: can the account receive block incentives if its balance is in range at proposal time.

last-heartbeat.description: The round in which this account last went online, or explicitly renewed their online status.

last-proposed.description: The round in which this account last proposed the block.

min-balance.description:
MicroAlgo balance required by the account.

The requirement grows based on asset and application usage.

participation.description: AccountParticipation describes the parameters used by this account in consensus protocol.

selection-participation-key.description: Selection public key (if any) currently registered for this round.

state-proof-key.description: Root of the state proof key (if any)

vote-first-valid.description: First round for which this participation is valid.

vote-key-dilution.description: Number of subkeys in each batch of participation keys.

vote-last-valid.description: Last round for which this participation is valid.

vote-participation-key.description: root participation public key (if any) currently registered for this round.

pending-rewards.description: amount of MicroAlgos of pending rewards in this account.

reward-base.description: used as part of the rewards computation. Only applicable to accounts which are participating.

rewards.description: total rewards of MicroAlgos the account has received, including pending rewards.

round.description: The round for which this information is relevant.

sig-type.description:
the type of signature used by this account, must be one of:
* sig
* msig
* lsig
* or null if unknown

status.description:
voting status of the account's MicroAlgos
* Offline - indicates that the associated account is delegated.
*  Online  - indicates that the associated account used as part of the delegation pool.
*   NotParticipating - indicates that the associated account is neither a delegator nor a delegate.

total-apps-opted-in.description: The count of all applications that have been opted in, equivalent to the count of application local data (AppLocalState objects) stored in this account.

total-assets-opted-in.description: The count of all assets that have been opted in, equivalent to the count of AssetHolding objects held by this account.

total-box-bytes.description: For app-accounts only. The total number of bytes allocated for the keys and values of boxes which belong to the associated application.

total-boxes.description: For app-accounts only. The total number of boxes which belong to the associated application.

total-created-apps.description: The count of all apps (AppParams objects) created by this account.

total-created-assets.description: The count of all assets (AssetParams objects) created by this account.

current-round.description: Round at which the results were computed.
